website_summaries.verdict: This unique neck traction device is intended for use in any location, at any time.
pros: Simple to attach the device to a door, railing or pole
Comes with 2 adjustable straps that are easy to use
Requires only about 10 minutes per day to help relieve neck tension
Sold with a 60-day money-back guarantee and 6-month warranty
cons: Bungie cords may be too long or too firm for some users

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Products
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes of 1st use, the plastic clasp that holds the strap together broke. This caused the clasp to slingshot and hit me in the eye, giving me a black/red eye. It hit hard enough that I saw a bright flash. There was no warning about this danger in the instructions. I would give 0 starts if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE....DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!! Bungee broke away from strap and came crashing down on my face with the force of a stretched bungee cord with a plastic buckle attached. Still having pain in my right eye...seeing blurry and pain across my nose. I used it for 3 min. Horrible...do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: walter r ryan

customer_reviews.title: No instructions on how to use is concerning
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be of good quality and is as described. It is concerning that there are no directions, recommendations and instructions for use. Which way do you put the head piece on, foam pads up or down? How long and how often should it be used? Are there any safety precautions or conditions under which the product is contraindicated? It is after all, advertised as an FDA approved device.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 5 stars if there's an instruction on where my head/neck should rest on
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty impressed by the product. However, I can only give it 4 stars because I don't find any information about where my head/neck should rest on the device. I checked the included documentation and the official website. Yes, there are pictures and videos, but each person's body is different and it would be a lot more helpful if the company explicitly instructs user where our head/neck should rest on.
customer_reviews.author: Toys Samurai

customer_reviews.title: Door knob strap too long for door knobs
customer_reviews.text: The strap adjustment was just way too long for my door knobs and for most doors knobs . No rails were available to use inside house. The sewn strap option is a very stable apparatus - which I appreciated. Sorry that I had to return it. With the shortest strap adjustment, my head was lying on the floor. Great product but there needs to be a shorter adjustment on strap for lower door knobs.
customer_reviews.author: blue eyed blonde

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It slides down every door we have tried it on, it’s pretty cheap so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Z.

customer_reviews.title: No results costly to return
customer_reviews.text: Did not do anything beneficial plus it cost $12.00 to return it. It was awkward to use and with 3 of us trying it no one saw any benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: The Neck Hammock is a GENIUS product!!
customer_reviews.text: I must say, where I don't typically write review, I had to here! The Neck Hammock is in fact something you didn't realize you were missing your entire life, until you've tried it! It brings a calm to your mind, body, and spirit, that is pure bliss. Clearer thinking, more flexibility in my neck, and overall increase in my well being are all a few results of using the neck hammock..Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Jakob morelli

customer_reviews.title: Broken right out of the box! Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Taken out of the package and immediately noticed the strap was not sewn onto the product rendering it utterly useless! To purchase a product for relief and relaxation to unbox to a broken and unusable product is one of the most unrelaxing experiences you can encounter. This is BS and demand a refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: It took over a month for it to arrive. Packaging was cheap and item looks poorly made. Does not stretch or elongate the neck at all, in fact I don't know what this product even does. It's basically a sling for your head. WAY too expensive, trying to return it but it's one of those third party deals so I'm not too optimistic. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SNS

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this and it helped my pain a lot when I would kink my neck while sleeping. The clip broke though after barely a month (it's plastic). I want another one but I don't want to spend another $50 on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected or advertised; slips off
customer_reviews.text: This was not as advertised- beware. However, if you play around with it, you may be able to make it work to stretch your neck enough to make it worth it to keep it. I was going to return it after it dropped my head to the floor!! ... but then I am very determined.. and I kept trying... and I decided to keep it. I bunched it up and I made it work .. "somewhat" but be careful. I don't see how this can stay on anyone's neck without slipping off.
customer_reviews.author: LUCY

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy the "original" for a few reasons: 1) the quality of the straps that are sewn into the hammock, and 2) to support a fellow practitioner. I am a Speech Therapist, and sitting all day while doing therapy really puts a strain on my upper back and neck muscles. This product seems to work great. One thing I noticed is that upon removal, you feel increased blood flow and my neck muscle pain is considerably reduced.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The Neck Hammock came in its own bag with easy to follow instructions. I use mine on my bedroom door handle and lay my yoga mat down in front of the door. I usually decompress my neck and lengthen my neck muscles for about 10 minutes. This device has helped immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Crap product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good idea but unless I'm using it wrong, the straps keep loosening and therefore doesn't support my head. I'm so disappointed. I need neck and shoulder releif and I was hoping this would provide it. UPDATE: This "neck hammock" is complete trash and a rip-off. I'm so frustrated with the fact the my neck and shoulders need relief but I can't use this damn product!! The reason the being is the strap won't keep I place and the friggin thing slips right the floor with my head in it!!! I will be emailing the "doctor" who created this and letting him know what he's selling in Amazon is not the same as what's being advertised.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't dare to keep using it
customer_reviews.text: I was unimpressed from the start with this product. It did not come with the pouch, eye mask or any instructions on use. I started to feel unsafe using it as it was made with a plastic clasp that could easily come undone and hit me in the face under all that tension. I went back to the reviews and saw that yes, indeed this has happened to multiple users. I should have read the reviews more carefully. Hope this helps others to make a more informed decision on this particular product. As for effectiveness, I didn't dare keep using it long enough to notice any difference here or there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Um...good I guess
customer_reviews.text: Here's my .02. Pros: It's very comfy, feels great, and forces me to calm down/meditate/stretch Cons: I'm no doctor, but it doesn't seem to be fixing the problem...just making it feel a bit better
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Impractical
customer_reviews.text: You’ll be much more comfortable just laying in bed with a good pillow. Hanging this from a doorknob and laying on the floor is not a recipe for feeling better.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: Took months to arrive and highly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This product took months to arrive, despite showing that it was 'in stock'. The product does seem to be of good quality, however, it is highly overpriced for what it is worth. Doesn't lift you head much off of the ground. Does offer some relief, but not nearly as much as what the commercial shows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. As someone that formerly practiced physical therapy, I decided to order this product for relief of upper neck tension. This product is simple to use and well made. The neck padding is the right amount and the unit does not pull on the ears. The suspension straps have a nice amount of give to them. I really like that for a reasonable price it comes with a bag for storage and eye mask for relaxation. ( Video and meditation instruction options too) I like this product for my own use and this is definitely a product I would have recommended for the appropriate neck patients to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This item does not treat neck pain associated with worn or compressed neck vertebra. In order to use it you have to basically lock yourself in a room because of the way it attaches to the door. The pads squeeze your ears so you cannot hear either and makes wearing ear buds uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J.AX

customer_reviews.title: Think it all the way through first
customer_reviews.text: I was full of intention to use this but I don’t like getting on the floor to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is really uncomfortable around the face/jaw area. My friend had one made by a different brand and it was so comfortable. I used this one for ~10 minutes and was more sore after using. Clearly the brand selection makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Henry

customer_reviews.title: What every 5 star review said!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I have had a nagging neck pain/shoulder issue for a long year or more! I used this contraption just once and boom, I haven't felt that nagging pain even once since then! Its been a month!! And when I laid my head in that cradle, I felt stress leave my body! Heavenly!! I wish I could make it a regimen (and I will), especially while meditating! It is MAGIC!! If you are experiencing any neck pain from stress, massage is nice but only temporary and expensive, this very affordable device is always at your fingertips and ready to help you feel better!
customer_reviews.author: Cory D

customer_reviews.title: Seller please respond
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you choose to return it, which I did because my head always touched the ground no matter what setting. I chose return and it processed replacement. No way to contact seller. So seller, if you’re out there please advise. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: tgis

customer_reviews.title: Relief Instantly
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck hammock. I have a some herniated discs in my neck and also seem to carry a lot of tension in my neck and shoulders. I feel relief immediately upon using it and fell asleep on the floor using it the other day, it was so relaxing. Falling asleep on the hard floor is not something I imagined myself doing but I did. My sister has used it and she loves it too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kat L

customer_reviews.title: Headaches gone
customer_reviews.text: Hello: the nature of my work (computer) is to cause tension in the back of my neck and shoulders. I lost mobility and developed periodic headaches (emanating from the back of my neck). After using the Neck Hammock about once a day, I am (after years) like a new person. The tension headaches are gone! If I feel tension, a 10 minute + rest with the Neck Hammock usually relieves it, so I don't need to take any headache medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel and Barry

customer_reviews.title: takes a little bit of getting used to, but so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily for 10-15 minutes, while meditating or listening to calming music. Since using it, I have a lot less pain and stiffness in my neck. My neck was so stiff that my chiropractor could never "pop" it. I have noticed that since using this, I can sometimes pop my own neck. (haven't been back to the chiropractor yet.) It takes a little getting used to, and you need to be able to get up and down off the floor to use it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Hendricksen

customer_reviews.title: Painful waste of money!  Back to PT again
customer_reviews.text: Thus was recommended by my PT but honestly it’s worthless, it’s so uncomfortable and dies not work at all like the traction machine. Fur me this was a total waste of money and if I had realized that I would have returned it right away but I didn’t have time to try it it quick enough and couldn’t find the box the return it, Uncomfortable us actually an understatement, this actually hurt my neck more. Should have tried the inversion table instead. But mid I’m back to the PT office once again trying to relieve the awful pain.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Pashko

customer_reviews.title: This does work
customer_reviews.text: I have been in pain from an accident for over seven months. My head/neck have been stiff and difficult to move. I do have a small tear in my shoulder. Because of Covid-19 I have been hesitant to go to any specialists and came upon this item through a search. Once you can figure out how to hook it up to the doorknob and get it in the perfect position for your head, it seriously gave me major relief. I am using it twice daily and I am noticing a difference.
customer_reviews.author: pepper

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I bought it. The first day I used it wrong and it still felt good. After experimenting with the height and placement of the hammock to get it’s maximum benefit, It is actually an amazing product. I use it any time I’m done working on the computer, or looking at my phone too much and you feel the pull all the way down your spine. After using it for 5-10 minutes you instantly feel your better posture, and mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Yousif Said

customer_reviews.title: Massage Therapist Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that comes with terrible instructions. I highly recommend googling a video or photo set up to see what angle you should be at to feel the stretch properly. I am a massage therapist and I recommend this to all of my clients for at home neck and upper back tension relief. It’s very relaxing, comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money and buy this for your neck
customer_reviews.text: I have had neck pain going back to my days as a paratrooper, and I recently ran into an extended spell that sent pain down in to my right shoulder. I knew I needed some type of traction gizmo, and this was it. Spend the cash for the price of this -- I tried an inferior knock-off that didn't have the strap adjustment points that you really need for the best setup. I returned it and got this.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but effective...
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective exercise for some types of pain. Unfortunately, it is way overpriced for what it is. I could make my own for a few dollars. Live and learn. If money is no object, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Can injure yourself
customer_reviews.text: Consult with your doctor or physical therapist before using, else you could further injure yourself --- My experience
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think it would work - but has done the job.
customer_reviews.text: Looked like an odd product but has worked well for neck pain. A little uncomfortable when using because it squeezes the ears but you get used to it. Have used for about two weeks, for 5-10 minutes every other day and have had good results. Did not want to overdo it. Neck feels less stiff and getting fewer headaches from sore neck muscles. A little tricky getting adjusted, but there is a strap you can tighten when laying down which helps.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Easy company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable and convenient to use but I didn’t feel any difference. I’ve had back and shoulder problems, not neck problems so maybe it wasn’t meant for me. They were very nice about my sending it back and gave me a free return label.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works for me...
customer_reviews.text: I have some compressed discs in my neck and sometimes it gets painful and stiff... My physical therapist did some manual hand traction on my neck and it helped.. but going there is inconvenient every time my neck bothers me.... this hammock just goes wherever i need it to and hangs from a knob... it does the same exact thing the physical therapist did but saves me having to book appointments and being inconvenienced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical purchasing this, but after reading the reviews decided to give it a try. I have been rear ended three times and have suffered from neck pain since the age of 16. I normally get monthly massages, but that is not an option right now with the social distancing, another reason I was looking for pain relief. The first time I used it I noticed instantly a difference, as my pain went away. I could not believe it. I use it daily now sometimes more than once a day. Highly recommend this product if you suffer from neck back. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: If you want to throw away $, go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Prepare to feel like an idiot, this does nothing but set you up for blackmail photos. Absolutely no pain relief, you could do the same thing with a strap and small pillow.
customer_reviews.author: BRalph11

customer_reviews.title: Best Remedy for My Neck Pain
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from neck pain, but have a discomfort with the idea of chiropractors. I knew if I could somehow elongate my neck to relieve pressure, it would be a huge help. Along comes the Neck Hammock! No idea how long it's been around, but it's wonderful. Very easy to use, very comfortable, accessories are a nice bonus, only worry is I might fall asleep in it (warning with product NOT to do so).
customer_reviews.author: No One of Consequence

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money. My door would not close all the way and getting on and off the floor was a real nuisance. The head sling did not provide the traction I need. This thing now resides in my closet and I have returned to an old fashioned over-the-door traction unit which always worked best for me.
customer_reviews.author: SWR

customer_reviews.title: Not effective at all. Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what the hype is or why all the positive reviews? This has done nothing. Does not stretch the neck at all. Also the plastic wear seems extremely cheap, and i have my husband hold onto it while it’s wrapped around the door in fear it will break and i will get hit in the face while using it like a lot of users have reported. I tried to request return and seller never responded. Very disappointed!!!! I want mt money back! BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: This works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my neck/shoulder issues. You have to find a good spot to set it up but it's easy to use and just a few minutes helps alleviate the pain from being at a computer all day!
customer_reviews.author: tidepix

customer_reviews.title: Not relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the Neck Hammock after watching a few videos and reading a few articles about it. I was sure to buy the “official” hammock, as I head the unofficial could damage your neck. While this is easy to use, I haven’t found it at all pain relieving or relaxing. Your head is attached to elastic, which, for me, feels unsettling. I don’t really use this at all anymore and is relegated to the pile of junk I probably shouldn’t have bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: cotwolds

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this for my neck stiffness from sitting at my desk all day. I just don't get where people say this is so great. I don't really notice any difference after using it multiple times. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T Meys

customer_reviews.title: The neck hammock is very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: Normally, because there is little activity, the cervical spine stays in a position for a long time, and it will feel uncomfortable after a long time. I tried it when the goods arrived, and I felt that the effect was very good, and it did feel relaxed. It's an artifact baby. The use process is very comfortable, it can give a certain relief to the cervical spine, it is also very convenient to use, and the quality is super good. You can buy it with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good for headaches.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a pinched nerve in his C6/C7 and I was hoping this would provide more traction but I should have realized it really just takes the pressure off the vertebrae and doesn't provide enough traction to release the nerve enough for him. I think this would work great for headaches. I did return it only because I couldn't afford to keep it w needing to get his cortisone injections and to get traction Chiropractically. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jfer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke as I was hanging on door the 1st time! Never even got to use
customer_reviews.author: Kingsley Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic clip makes it dangerous to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for awhile. It really helped my neck pain but it has a plastic clip that no longer holds which because of the tension on the elastic while using it resulted in me getting hit very hard in the head when the clip malfunctioned....twice. A few months ago I would have highly recommended this product but now I say don't waste your money and look for a better made version.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: I should have read reviews instead of looking at rating
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews I now see, there are no instructions, I have to be about 3 feet away from door to just get head off ground, it presses soo hard on your head it gives a headache I could actually here my heartbeat in my ears. I went online to see if I missed something but seems to me I was doing it correctly. Then I see review of breakage scares me even more as there is quite a bit of tension on elastic straps. Will definitely be looking to return this. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t what I thought it would be like. I didn’t feel any stretch in my muscles. I tried to go further and further away from handle with no added tension. Had a friend try it and Had the same opinion. It does feel nice if you are just looking to relax and not relieve anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Perkins

customer_reviews.title: a valuable health & comfort purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this 10 minutes a day, and after the first 2 days, I noticed that my neck & back pain was being relieved and my migraines too! I really didn't want to have to start going to a chiropractor, because it seems like you have to keep going every week for repeat visits. This neck hammock does the trick! It was helpful to watch the videos to see how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It's simple to set up, well made and looks/operates as described but its only getting 1 star bc I didn't feel the relaxation/tension relief etc. after a few uses I started to get mild neck pain so I discontinued using it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: Neck hammock
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my husband because he was having a lot of neck stiffness & trouble turning his head. He has found it helps a lot with the stiffness. There is an added benefit in that is is so comfortable that the time he spends using it is totally relaxing so it not only helps his neck, but his over all body just having the 20 minutes or so of relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: JEANIE M. ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Helps with neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I was a little reluctant to try this thinking it was going to crack my neck. I could not have been more wrong. It's easy to assemble and feels amazing when you lay down on it, where you could literally fall asleep. I use it all the time for my stiff neck and it absolutely helps! I would highly recommend this if you are having any type of neck soreness.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: stupid product and expensive
customer_reviews.text: It does nothing and waste of money... I would pay $9.99... plus adjustments are funny.... my door handle are low.... so it's just sits on floor... I undjust it and raise little higher from floor... and nothing... lol on video acting like they're having some "great feelings" I felt zippy nothing great...
customer_reviews.author: Lollipop Rooster

customer_reviews.title: A lot chaeper than physical therapy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pinched nerve in my neck that caused severe shoulder pain and neck stiffness. After weeks of expensive physical therapy, including traction therapy, the pain went away. After a month I started to feel it coming back. I bought the Neck Hammock and stated using it 15 minutes every night before bed. The pain went away and now I use it every other night just to keep my disc's from compressing and pinching the nerve. It works great and is much cheaper than PT!
customer_reviews.author: freebird

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: The ads really got me on this one, I thought it was going to be a game changer. Don’t get me wrong it works well, but it doesn’t provide the incredible relief that they mention. In short, it’s a good product that relief some pain but needs some improvement to give my neck a better / more deep stretch to relieve more pain.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Avolio

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he found great relief after using this. He uses this twice a week for about ten minutes each time and said it's decompressed his c spine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and provides relief, promotes blood flow. The key is to relax.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waiting to get some “at home traction” for a long time and I was so excited to finally be able to use this product. It’s very straight forward and easy to use. I find if I adjust where it cradles the base of my skull, and cinches down I can get additional “pops” with more relief. The most important key is to be able to relax your back and neck muscles so that the hammock can do it’s job. I have several back and neck issues and I really enjoy this product. My only concern is the endurance of the elastic bands from moving the cinch up and down, but it does seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: D3IVIO7V

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!✨🌟✨
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Perfect in all Regards!!✨🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟✨ The quality is outstanding! And it was ready to use out of the box. I bought a different one and the bungee snapped on first use.. This one is Incredibly strong and well made it feels like it will last many years. One of the other biggest differences is unlike most of the other ones I have tried or seen this one has a strap you pull while you are using that increases the traction with each pull which gives me legit traction and decompression! I felt 2 inches taller after first use! Love Love Love!💖
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Collins

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work with my lever door handles.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t able to make it work with my lever door handles so had to return it. It felt great while using it but the strap slipped down on the handle and opened the door, so my head lowered to the floor and the door hit me. It didn’t hurt me, but after trying several ways to attach it I thought it just wasn’t for me. I had it attached correctly, on the opposite side of the door per the instructions. I say buy it though! Door knobs must be the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: It's a well made product, but my husband and I both tried it and I felt no traction at all, in fact it gave me a mild headache. My husband had seen his chiropractor earlier in the day and this hammock undid the relief he got from his chiropractic appointment earlier. I will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Berryman

customer_reviews.title: I figured it out! And love it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice. It helps my pain in my neck. It took me a minute to figure out how I was going to use it. My door handles aren't high enough to utilize it how the instructions say to. So I had to buy a heavy duty eye hook to put in my door frame of my hallway to run the neck traction device through to be able to use it. But once I figured this part out, I've been using it for a couple of weeks now and I can honestly say that this has helped alleviate my neck pain. I have herniated discs in my neck. So this is extremely helpful. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: April Norton

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Has a buckle that "feels" like it wont hold. Doesn't feel secure or safe. The distraction or "pull" does not give a good stretch. Save your money and look into something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $49.99
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertised in a timely manner, but, does not work for me and my neck pain. I hope it helps someone but it really didn't seem to apply traction as much as pinching my ears and pulling my head up, specifically it does not provide longitudinal traction by it's design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. I did not feel a difference or any relief when using this.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cash

customer_reviews.title: It is very useful
customer_reviews.text: This thing has a good effect on my neck and makes me feel very comfortable.Before I had joint, the neck is not very good, is usually very suffered, the pain has been with me, in the hospital, I always adhere to the treatment, but just ease the pain, use this stuff, it traction will let you immediately alleviate the pressure of the intervertebral disc caused by the pressure line, lying a few times every day, every time can be very comfortable lying down, he will let you feel very useful, if your neck and uncomfortable situation, it is strongly recommended that you use it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and not very well made
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it took over a month to get this item delivered. The made of this product is not that great, not a single metal piece for a $50 unit. There's limitation as to setting this up, could have made the strap a little more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: IAMPUIPC

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I tried this to relieve head aches and it didn’t work so I thought I’d give it to my mom who suffers from migraine and didn’t work either. I didn’t feel any stretching on my neck at all. Feels More like using a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: sadie

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, check with your doctor
customer_reviews.text: This product is not adequate to what it proposes to do. It's a waste of money and dangerous. I don't any doctor would recommend using that product, but if you really into it, consult yours first.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Pegoraro

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it but got more pain instead.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried it, it felt very comfortable. It’s pretty easy to set up, so at initially I was excited, thinking I had found something that I could use regularly for headache relief. The next time I tried it I had a bad headache and unfortunately, it did not ease pain and actually made my headache worse. The third time I tried it, I just wanted to relax but my lower spine and sacroiliac on one side started to hurt. I wish I could return it, but it’s too late at this point. Maybe it works for some people, but it didn’t work for me and I’m bummed I spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: KBrackett

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and major back and neck issues. Went for a period of time with severe neck pain that cause a permanent head ache. After two days of use the headache was gone! I highly highly recommend this to anyone in pain or discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Trejo

customer_reviews.title: ugh.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I tried it multiple times. I returned it. I just don't get how this works so well for folks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Neck Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: My head is supposed to hang 2-4 inches off the floor. the strap is too long for that, so my head hangs about an inch off the floor. I've only used it once this week, since I just received it on Wednesday.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable, a family essential
customer_reviews.text: With a herniated disc in my neck and daily tension headaches/migraines, this product has helped tremendously. I’ve spent hundreds of dollars in the ER, physical therapy, and doctor visits, so the price is phenomenal. Traction is great to speed the process in healing a herniated disc, and i immediately had more range of motion and a decrease in tension headaches since I started using this. I try to use 15 min in the morning and 15 min in the evening. I’m sleeping better, and just feel so much better. Thank you for inventing this!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Must have this. It works
customer_reviews.text: I have pinched nerves in 5 6 and 7.was told to go into physical therapy but i saw this and wanted to try it first. OMG. I had relief within just a few minutes of using the neck hammock.no need for therapy now. It is amazing. I bought 2 more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product totally helps relieve tension in my neck. I bought the neck hammock because I pinched a nerve in my neck from my old work from home set up, I was in a lot of pain. When it arrived, I would use it, morning, noon, and right before I went to bed, 15 minutes each time. Within the first week of use, the pain in my neck reduced by 50%. Then eventually the pain was gone. Even to this day, if I wake up with a tension headache/pain in my neck, I lay in my neck hammock and it helps reduce the pain.
customer_reviews.author: f. barnes

customer_reviews.title: Most Amazing Neck Pain Relief Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from horrible neck pain the last few years due to a combination of stress, looking down when texting, posture and sitting at a desk. I did not find any relief until I tried The Neck Hammock. The Neck Hammock only takes a couple minutes a day, is so easy to use and has become apart of my weekly routine. It has relieved the neck pain and tension in my neck significantly. I am so thankful for the invention of this product!
customer_reviews.author: MissCouture4

customer_reviews.title: It does relieve tension
customer_reviews.text: All of our family members have used this with mixed results. "It feels good" to "it opened up my sinuses and relieved some tension in my neck". Looking forward to using this on a daily basis as it really does relieve everyday tension.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: You will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from blights of shots, therapy and numerous stretches, chiropractors and other devices that did not work. This does! I use it 15 minutes in the morning and 15 minutes at night when needed. I forgot what a great night sleep was until this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Get this product right now if you have neck problems!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so good for my husband (and me!). Anytime he wakes up with a pinched nerve or twinges it at work, he will lay in the neck hammock and his pain is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really do anything , $50 for that please .
customer_reviews.author: mike recos

customer_reviews.title: Instantly Takes the pressure off my neck!
customer_reviews.text: This is my answer to getting rid of the stress of the day. Great for using after working on the computer for hours, or doing any work that is a pain in the neck. Also useful for the number of injuries done to my neck since childhood. Definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: michael Foran

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly works better than expected, helps stretch my neck
customer_reviews.text: This product needs better instructions on how to install it on a door but after i figured it out and place my neck on it, i felt a immediate relief on my neck as it rest on it. Of course its not going to replace physical therapy or a good massage but it really helps with fast relief at home. I have a desk job and have a very tight neck and shoulder, the moment I rest on it, it felt relief. It has a lot of cushion/padding and very comfortable to rest in.
customer_reviews.author: Burke Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Not as much relief as I was led to believe
customer_reviews.text: I have a pinched nerve and I got this to help decompress. It pulls a bit the pads hit your pressure points in your temple and back of neck. Just not the relief I was hoping to get
customer_reviews.author: Debbie DiFiore

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Tbh, Idk if this thing does anything for my tight neck and shoulders, but for the 5 minutes at a time that I use it, it feels very comfortable. It doesn't really relieve the tension, as I pointed out. And I don't want to stay in it too long, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cervical spine therapy at home.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful device for relaxing the cervical spine at home. This makes it easy to safely stretch my head neck and shoulder muscles on my own. This is extremely helpful when I am experiencing discomfort in my neck. It feels amazing to lay down on the ground and have my head suspended in the sling. The decompression of my spine and stretch of my muscles really reduces pains and helps me treat myself as the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Child

customer_reviews.title: The effect was OK
customer_reviews.text: I am a programmer. I sit in front of the computer every day and cause cervical spondylosis. The pain makes me sleep hard at night. I bought this cervical traction device to try. I fixed it on the wall and put a yoga mat on the ground. At night, I fell asleep on it. I didn't expect that the pain was reduced a lot and my sleep was much better
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for neck tension and pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful device for relaxing the cervical spine at home. This makes it easy to safely stretch my head neck and shoulder muscles on my own. This is extremely helpful when I am experiencing discomfort in my neck. It feels amazing to lay down on the ground and have my head suspended in the sling. The decompression of my spine and stretch of my muscles really reduces pains and helps me treat myself as the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Judith

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: No directions and hard to keep attached to the knob.
customer_reviews.author: nancy reynolds

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This device really works. I had pain relief after the first use. I use a 15 minute meditation to be mindful of the 15 minute time limit. This was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: This odd contraption really does work. The neck And shoulder pain relief is marked. It’s somewhat hard to get the right length but once you do you will go back to it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Acosta-Cruz

customer_reviews.title: If I can remember to use it!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple times. I do feel a pull in my lower back of the muscles around my spine stretching, which is great. Just need to make the time to do it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant...but this really does work
customer_reviews.text: I strained my neck - I really wasn't sure how, but I suffered for a few weeks. I have a physical therapist and myofascial release therapist, but the holidays, work, etc. didn’t allow anytime for an appointment. To my surprise after one use of the Neck Hammock I felt so much better, after a second try I was telling everyone I know about this product. It really works and I rarely write reviews. Sometimes simple is best.
customer_reviews.author: Ltwo

customer_reviews.title: More attention to use per person
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and felt like pain was lessened. But more pain came next day.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gift this Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was just a ridiculous fad. When I opened it at Christmas I assumed I’d be returning it but let me feel you.... this is amazing! I have a headboard on my bed that it easily hangs in which makes it a little bit more comfortable than lying on the floor. It’s the perfect way to end the day.
customer_reviews.author: Christyn McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I ended up mounting this in our closet in the second level hanging rack so it sits pretty high and there's enough length to do that. It's pretty comfortable too and feels secure. The elastic bands provide a little give so it's not just stuff material. There's a little bounce to it. The double layer strap that goes around your head is comfortable. It's a really though out design.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful....
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really position you for benefit of “traction”...which when done properly, allows for gentle stretching of the neck area. This doesn’t accomplish that - just sort of awkwardly supports your neck off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: SPC

product_meta.title: The Neck Hammock Portable Cervical Traction Device for Neck Pain Relief and Physical Therapy
feature_bullets: The Original Neck Hammock is a patented cervical traction assistant that works by gently pulling the head away from the neck to stretch and decompress the spinal cord, which increases bloodflow, oxegenates the surrounding muscles, decreases pain, and increases mobility of the neck and shoulders.

The Neck Hammock takes only 10 minutes a day and is the easiest, most portable, one-size-fits-all solution for your back and neck troubles - perfect for athletes, long flights, business trips, long work days, and more!
The patented straps are designed to wrap around any door, railing, or pole, giving you the flexibility to use the Neck Hammock wherever you want - no more laborious setup or oversized equipment
Comes with 2 sewn-in, medical-grade adjustable straps for customizable comfort & maximum durability.

The Neck Hammock was created by Dr. Steve Sudell Jr., a licensed physical therapist with over a decade of experience in physical rehabilitation. U.S. Pat. Nos. 10,307,284, D824,035, D845,492, D845,493, and D845,494.
